# HUD::SET_INSIDE_VERY_LARGE_INTERIOR

## Parameters
* **BOOL** veryLargeInterior

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Flags the current interior as very large. Zooms out more so the area is easier to navigate.
